Terminology Code Systems

Turtle | RDF/XML | N-Triples | JSON-LD | GitHub
terminology-code-systems:
a
owl:Ontology
dct:creator
Hans Cools, MD, knowledge engineer, ontologist, software developer, Basel University, Switzerland
dct:description
Formal description of terminology and code systems and their datatypes, as link between system data and OWL-ontologies and RDF-data.
dct:license
http://creativecommons.org/ licenses/ by/ 3.0/
skos:note
Other datatypes are declared in a respective domain ontology, e.g. calendar:julianDate, languages:iso639-2, and text:characterSize.
dct:publisher
Universities of Basel, Bern, and Zürich, Switzerland
dct:title
An ontology about terminology and code systems
owl:versionInfo
2020-06-11

Classes

terminology-code-systems:ColorCodingSystem
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
System to code colors.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
terminology-code-systems:
rdfs:label
color coding system (en)
rdfs:subClassOf
concept:CodingSystem
terminology-code-systems:gnd
a
rdfs:Class,
rdfs:Datatype
rdfs:comment
Datatype to type a GND-number numeral.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
terminology-code-systems:
rdfs:label
GND-datatype (en)
terminology-code-systems:gndSystem
a
rdfs:Class,
concept:CodingSystem
concept:codingSystemHasDatatype
terminology-code-systems:gnd
rdfs:comment
The Integrated Authority File (in German Gemeinsame Normdatei, GND) is an authority file for persons, corporate bodies, conferences and events, geographic information, topics and works.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
terminology-code-systems:
rdfs:label
GND-system (en)
rdfs:seeAlso
https://www.dnb.de/ EN/ Standardisierung/ GND/ gnd node.html
terminology-code-systems:oai
a
rdfs:Class,
rdfs:Datatype
rdfs:comment
Datatype to type an OAI-identifier literal.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
terminology-code-systems:
rdfs:label
OAI-datatype (en)

Instances

terminology-code-systems:hexadecimalColor
a
rdfs:Datatype,
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Datatype to type a literal representing a hexadecimal color code.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
terminology-code-systems:
rdfs:label
hexadecimal color datatype (en)
terminology-code-systems:hexadecimalColorCodingSystem
a
terminology-code-systems:ColorCodingSystem,
rdfs:Class
concept:codingSystemHasDatatype
terminology-code-systems:hexadecimalColor
rdfs:comment
Color coding system to represent a color with a hex triplet or six-digit, three-byte hexadecimal number. The bytes represent the red, green and blue components of the color. Used in HTML, CSS, SVG, and other computing applications.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
terminology-code-systems:
rdfs:label
hexadecimal color coding system (en)
rdfs:seeAlso
https://en.wikipedia.org/ wiki/ Web colors
terminology-code-systems:oaiSystem
a
concept:CodingSystem,
rdfs:Class
concept:codingSystemHasDatatype
terminology-code-systems:oai
rdfs:comment
The Open Archives Initiative.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
terminology-code-systems:
rdfs:label
OAI-system (en)
rdfs:seeAlso
https://www.openarchives.org/

Properties

terminology-code-systems:hasGNDNumber
a
owl:ObjectProperty
rdfs:comment
Relating a resource to its GND-identifier.
rdfs:domain
rdfs:Resource
rdfs:isDefinedBy
terminology-code-systems:
rdfs:label
hat GND-Identifikator (de)
has GND-number (en)
skos:note
example:personX tcs:hasGNDNumber [concept:codeHasSystem tcs:gndSystem; concept:codeHasValue "118679325"^^tcs:gnd].
rdfs:range
concept:Code
rdfs:subPropertyOf
concept:hasCode
terminology-code-systems:hasHexadecimalColorCodeValue
a
owl:DatatypeProperty
rdfs:comment

rdfs:domain
rdfs:Resource
rdfs:isDefinedBy
terminology-code-systems:
rdfs:label

hat hexadezimaler Farbekodewert (de)
skos:note
example:page1 tcs:hasHexadecimalColorCodeValue "000000"^^tcs:hexadecimalColor.
rdfs:range
terminology-code-systems:hexadecimalColor
rdfs:subPropertyOf
concept:hasCodeValue
